A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Criminal waste of so sacred an artistic property. Almost as bad as the middle 3 movies\, but with better actors to misuse\, in this case. This writer/director had no feeling for the material\, settled for or even pursued childlike sensationalism\, and WASTED so many moments\, not to mention the acting talent at his disposal. I hate the Peter Principle. To whom was this daft\, self-indulgent person accountable\, artistically\, and even technically? Where was the editor? A gorgeously shot waste of 150 minutes of life one will regret never getting back.
